element.description: Approved special items for the Guardians campaign.

description.p: sssss

[Passive] You can float above any walkable surface by up to 1ft and can move normally as if walking. You are not slowed by any difficult terrain and are not subject to dex saves/checks from mundain terrain that otherwise impose them to walk across.

sheet.description: Enter the void. • You can float above any walkable surface by up to 1ft and can move normally as if walking. • You are not slowed by any difficult terrain and are not subject to dex saves/checks from mundain terrain that otherwise impose them to walk across.

description.p: [Passive] You gain your proficiency modifier to your initiative. You may spend your reaction to delay acting in initiative order.

sheet.description: You can delay acting in initiative order.

description.p: (need to find a couple of wind themed spells to cast prof times per long rest.)

sheet.description: (need to find a couple of wind themed spells to cast prof times per long rest.)

description.p: Your base movement speed is doubled, this applies to all natural movement forms you have. This includes when transformed by polymorph or wildshape.

sheet.description: All innate speeds are doubled.

description.p: You generate a region of breathable atmosphere for yourself and everyone within 30ft of you. This region is free of all atmospheric related effects that would otherwise be present (toxic gas, no oxygen, etc.) This ability lasts for 4 hours. You may use this a number of times equal to your proficiency modifier.

sheet.description: You can generate a region of clean breathable atmosphere for yourself and everyone within 30ft while of you for 4hrs.

description.p: While you are conscious you are perpetually under the "Freedom of Movement" spell.

sheet.description: Your movement has been enhanced. • You are unaffected by difficult terrain • Spells and other magical effects can neither reduce your speed nor cause you to be paralyzed or restrained. • You can spend 5ft of movement to automatically escape from nonmagical restraints or grapple. • Being underwater imposes no penalties on the your movement or attacks.

description.p: (Your wind magic is enhanced in some way if you took wind magic)
Your initiative ability is further enhanced, you additionally gain advantage on initiative rolls. IF you are surprised you may act last in the surprise round.

sheet.description: Your initiative is further enhanced. • You gain advantage on initiative rolls. • You may act last in the surprise round.

description.p: Your movement ability is further enhanced, Any affect that otherwise modifies your movement speed or grants you new forms of movement is doubled.

sheet.description: Any affect that otherwise modifies your movement speed or grants you new forms of movement is doubled.

description.p: Your Atmosphere ability is further enhanced, Your personal atmosphere is now permanent and you can willingly exclude creatures from the effect.

sheet.description: A stronger personal atmosphere • You can generate a region of clean breathable atmosphere for yourself and everyone within 30ft. • You can willingly exclude creatures from the effect.

description.p: Your DEX score increases to 20. Additionally you may use your reaction to reroll any DEX save/checks but you must take the new roll.

sheet.description: You can reroll any DEX save/checks but you must take the new roll.

description.p: It's a bag of holding in the likeness of the embodiment of the air element. It allowes for communication with the elemental entity once per day.
sssss
You gain resistance to fire damage from all sources. Additionally you are immune to exhaustion from hot environments.

sheet.description: You are immune to exhaustion from hot environments

description.p: Your weapons are imbued with your fire. You may willingly half your weapon damage to change it to fire. You must declair this when taking the attack action.

sheet.description: You may willingly half your weapon damage to change it to fire. You must declair this when taking the attack action.

description.p: You may exchange currency at crafting cost to generate any kind of man-portable ammunition.

description.p: For the crafting cost in currency you can generate any fire imbued item. Additionally you can contribute to other Synthesis.

description.p: Your STR score increases to 20. Additionally you may use your reaction to reroll any STR save/checks but you must take the new roll.

sheet.description: You can reroll any STR save/checks but you must take the new roll.

description.p: It's a spent hull of a shotgun shell that retains magic somehow. Your ranged attacks deal an additional 1d4 magic fire damage. You can commune with the elemental entity once per day.

description.p: For the cost of a spell slot you change the level of a spell scroll. (changing a scroll of fireball with a lv 6 spell slot changes the fireball to be cast at lv 6) You may recharge a number of magic items equivilent to your proficiency modifier.

sheet.description: Magic Tinkering • You can expend a spellslot to change the level of a spell scroll to the level of the slot used • You may recharge {{MagicRefinement:Recharge}} magic items per day

description.p: You are under the effect of Sanctuary. Once broken it will reapply after 1 minute.

sheet.description: You are under the effect of Sanctuary. Once broken it will reapply after 1 minute.

description.p: Your Medicine ability is enhanced, medications you administer are always at maximum potentcy.

sheet.description: Medications you administer are always at maximum potentcy.

description.p: Your Medical Refinement ability is enhanced. You may now enhance exotic/magical medicine. You may break down superior+ medicines into an equivilent number of lesser medicines.

sheet.description: Your Medical Refinement ability is enhanced. • You may now enhance exotic/magical medicine. • You may break down superior+ medicines into an equivilent number of lesser medicines.

description.p: You may cast Resurrection once per day with no material or magic expenditure. You learn Revivify, Resurrection, and True Resurrection.

sheet.description: You may cast Resurrection with no material or magic expenditure.

description.p: Your Magic Refinement ability is enhanced allowing you to double the number of recharges you have available. Additionally you can convert one spell of a willing creature into a spell scroll for free once per long rest.

sheet.description: You can convert one spell of a willing creature into a spell scroll for free.

description.p: Your Sanctuary ability is enhanced, creatures that fail their save against your sanctuary end their turn.

sheet.description: Creatures that fail their save against your sanctuary end their turn.

description.p: Your Revival ability is enhanced you may revive free unwilling creatures and your revival cast time is 1 round.

sheet.description: You may revive free unwilling creatures and your revival cast time is 1 round.

description.p: An amulet with a shiled, helmet, and sword emblazened on it. You may cast cure wounds (lv 1) once per day using it. You may cummune with the embodiment of light once per day.
